ResearchProjectDef.label: Droids
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks research options for building and maintaining droids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Droid Charge Pad
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks building the Droid Charging Pad, which will charge droids standing on it. Required to start building droids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MD2 Worker Droid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks building your first Droid - the worker droid. This droid will clean and haul things. Also unlocked is the Droid Assembly, which is where you will build all of your droids.
